briefDescription: Social Awareness for Mutual Upliftment through Guidance and Motivation (SAMUGAM) is a registered NGO under Indian Trust Act, established in 1991 is committed to the cause of rehabilitation of Leprosy patients and the physically challenged, education of the underprivileged children, the economic development of the oppressed community, the empowerment of the disabled and marginalized.Registration Details :Registration No : 13/1991PAN NO: AACTS720HIncome tax act : Exemption under Sec. 80 G & 12 A FCRA No. : 076040327
